techmeme.title: Siemens agrees to buy engineering software company Altair for ~$10B including debt, a 19% premium on Altair's October 21 closing price; deal to close in H2 2025 (Bloomberg)
Roku reports Q3 revenue up 16% YoY to $1.06B, vs. $1.02B est., 85.5M streaming households, up 2M QoQ, and Q4 guidance below est.; ROKU drops 11%+ after hours (Alexandra Canal/Yahoo Finance)
Nintendo announces Nintendo Music, an app that lets Switch Online subscribers stream or download gaming tunes from Nintendo titles, available on Android and iOS (Andrew Webster/The Verge)

Mark Zuckerberg says the company's AI-driven feed and video recommendations have led to an 8% increase in time spent on Facebook and a 6% increase on Instagram (Sarah E. Needleman/Wall Street Journal)
Mark Zuckerberg says Threads has almost 275M MAUs and is adding more than a million sign ups per day, while Meta AI has passed 500M MAUs (Karissa Bell/Engadget)
